name: Sniper Commando
description:
The time for drastic war action is now. We are calling for the best sniper in the world to join us as we take aim at evil, wherever it hides.
Aim and Shoot! Sniper is first person shooter game with various levels.
Eliminate a mob of enemies at street level or take out the single high-profile target. With access to an inventory of sniper rifles and assault rifles.
Go for the HEADSHOT.
Aim and Shoot! Leave no squad mate behind in this action oriented first person shooter game!

Game Features:
- Boasting spectacular graphics and blistering action sequences
- Real world weapons and challenging levels
- Local Mission mode
